actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Travel Act of 1961, as amended, to authorize the use of travel grants for foreign participants in familiarization tours to the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce, under the International Travel Act of 1961, to award travel grants to foreign travel trade representatives and journalists who participate in familiarization tours to the United States. Authorizes the Secretary to promulgate regulations governing such awards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Travel Act of 1961, as amended, to authorize the use of travel grants for foreign participants in familiarization tours to the United States.
